Message:
the lake suddenly dried up
entirely overnight.

Why...did this happen
all of a sudden...?

From that moment forth,
the atmosphere of the village
completely changed.

Smiles vanished
from peoples’ faces,
and the sound of music
could no longer be heard...

There were even people who
chose to leave the village behind.
All I could do was watch them go.

After all, how could someone
like me do anything to help...

It was then that it happened.
When I heard a song coming
from the dried lakebed.
